Data: 5.30pm Australia win the toss and bat first today. They are unchanged. As are Bangladesh.
Mahedi Hasan to Philippe, no run over the stumps. Full on off. Defended towards mid on
Mahedi Hasan to Philippe, no run full, wider outside off. A bit of movement in the air too. Driven, crunched to cover
Mahedi Hasan to Philippe, 1 run full toss, on off stump. Drilled to long on for a single. Freebit can't be put away
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, no run around the stumps. Full, outside off. Carey presses forward to drive, and sliced. On the bounce to point
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, no run full on middle. Pushed to the leg side
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, no run full just outside off stump. Defended to cover
Nasum to Philippe, 1 run round the wicket, touch short of a length outside off, worked towards mid-on
Nasum to Carey, FOUR runs round the wicket, it's a full toss outside off and Carey reverse sweeps to third man. It's a shot he likes
Nasum to Carey, no run comes over the wicket, conventional sweep this time from outside off and he finds square leg
Nasum to Carey, FOUR runs and now he reverses again, gets it past a diving point for another boundary...got himself across outside off stump
Nasum to Carey, no run the broom is out, he sweeps again but gets a bottom edge to the leg side
Nasum to Carey, 1 run gets forward and drives towards mid-off for a scampered single
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, 2 runs round the wicket, steps back and drives nicely through the covers with good timing but it just gets hauled back inside the rope
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, no run full at off stump, comes forward and defends to cover
Mahedi Hasan to Carey, OUT taken at mid-on! Mahedi gets Carey again. Full outside, looked to drag it over the leg side but the bat twisted and it took a thick inside edge
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, no run pushes forward and back to the bowler
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, no run full and straight, Marsh taps it to the on side
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, no run keeps it full at off stump, pushed into the off side, excellent over from Mahedi
Shakib to Philippe, 1 run nearly dragged on! Round the wicket, he plays forward and gets an inside edge past leg stump
Shakib to Marsh, no run holds this back a touch, it grips from around off stump, pushed into the covers
Shakib to Marsh, no run onto the front foot and drives into the off-side ring
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run skids on at the pads, worked just to the right of mid-on...Marsh had to get a move on. Out with a direct hit
Shakib to Philippe, 1 run full and straight, swept strongly to deep square leg
Shakib to Marsh, FOUR runs finds the gap this time, leans and back drives nicely through the gap at cover. Australia needed that

Nasum to Philippe, 1 run big appeal for lbw as Philippe misses a pull, taken on the back leg, no given on field and the review is call. This skidded through a touch, beat the under edge. Is it outside the line? Ah, well, he's actually hit it
Nasum to Marsh, FOUR runs strong shot...a full delivery on the stumps, Marsh deposits it over mid-on. Different game when Marsh is on strike
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run drives with an open face into the point region
Nasum to Philippe, no run full and straight, skews off a thick outside edge to backward point as he looks to drive
Nasum to Philippe, no run slides into middle and leg, cramps him for room, defended
Nasum to Philippe, 1 run tossed up with more air, full at the stumps, driven down the ground to long-on
Mustafizur to Philippe, FOUR runs over the wicket, low full toss at off stump, nicely put away with a drive straight of mid-off. Bit of a freebie
Mustafizur to Philippe, no run back of a length at middle and leg, much better, defended to the off side
Mustafizur to Philippe, no run good length at off stump, appears to grip in the surface, pop in the air to the on side

Mustafizur to Philippe, OUT takes leg stump! Magnificently done from Mustafizur. Philippe got in all sorts of a mess. A short-of-a-length delivery, he moved across the crease a touch and shaped to play to the leg side but was completely done by the slower ball. Brilliant bowling. Quick spin bowling.
Mustafizur to Henriques, 1 run full at the pads, worked into midwicket
Mustafizur to Marsh, no run wide outside off, can't get any timing into the off side
Shakib to Henriques, no run goes back in the crease and drives to point
Shakib to Henriques, no run fuller and pushes into the covers
Shakib to Henriques, 1 run on the back foot again and drives to long-off
Shakib to Marsh, no run this grips and Marsh loses all his timing and the ball dribbles into the on side
Shakib to Marsh, no run staying leg side of the ball to try and create some room, drives and picks out cover
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run a quicker delivery, into the pads, worked backward of square
Shoriful Islam to Marsh, FOUR runs over the wicket, full outside off, and that's a cracking lofted cover drive from Marsh...flew off the bat
Shoriful Islam to Marsh, 1 run pulls the length back a touch and is on the stumps, pushed out to deep cover
Shoriful Islam to Henriques, 1 run short of a length on leg stump, worked off the pads to long leg
Shoriful Islam to Marsh, no run big appeal for lbw as Marsh misses a pull but that looked to have pitched outside leg
Shoriful Islam to Marsh, 2 runs outside leg stump, tucked away fine but long leg is able to get across
Shoriful Islam to Marsh, 1 run worked off the pads to deep square leg
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run round the wicket, Marsh goes back outside leg stump then drives to the off-side sweeper
Nasum to Henriques, no run gets forward and pushes into the covers
Nasum to Henriques, 1 run drives down the ground to long-off
Nasum to Marsh, no run finds point as he drives
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run deep in the crease and whips this from outside off to long-on
Nasum to Henriques, no run well bowled, nearly gets through him a quicker one but Henriques is able to play back to the bowler
Soumya to Marsh, 1 run back of a length at off stump, pushed to long-on
Soumya to Henriques, 1 run worked off the pads into midwicket
Soumya to Marsh, no run full outside off, drives and finds cover
Soumya to Marsh, FOUR runs dropped in short and Marsh finds the gap between deep midwicket and deep square with a well-placed pull
Soumya to Marsh, no run fuller at the stumps, can't get it wide of the bowler
Soumya to Marsh, 1 run full outside off, driven to the cover sweeper
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run slides on with the arm, Marsh does well to angle it to short third man
Nasum to Henriques, SIX runs uses his feet and lofts this straight down the ground...breaks the shackles, excellent footwork. Third umpire confirms the six
Nasum to Henriques, no run good comeback, length delivery on the stumps, straightens and takes the outside edge
Nasum to Henriques, 1 run down the pitch again, doesn't get to it this time, is able to bunt it in the air down to long-off
Nasum to Marsh, 1 run eased along the ground to long-off
Nasum to Henriques, no run full and straight, gets squared up again as he plays to the bowler
Mustafizur to Marsh, no run slower ball, fullish, just outside off. Presses forward to play at it, but it goes past the edge to the keeper
Mustafizur to Marsh, 1 run full on leg, and patted to mid on's right for one
Mustafizur to Henriques, 1 run full on middle. Cutter again. Soft hand tap to the off side, and they are off for a single
Mustafizur to Marsh, 1 run full on leg, and pushed to mid on for another one
Mustafizur to Henriques, 1 run back of a length, just outside leg. Worked off his hip to deep backward square for one
Mustafizur to Marsh, 1 run full, and wider this time. Opens the bat's face to play the square drive to deep point
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run full on leg stump, and angling in from around the stumps. Stays on the back foot to flick towards deep midwicket

Shakib to Henriques, FOUR runs smacked! And sends the bowler ducking for cover. Full, just outside off. Skips down the ground, hammers it straight back, and long on running to his left can't stop it despite the dive
Shakib to Henriques, 1 run full, just outside off. Slower this time. Straightening. Punched to long on
Shakib to Marsh, 2 runs fullish, wider outside off but angling in slightly. Slapped in front of cover, to the fielder in the deep
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run full, on off. Sliding in as Marsh rocks back. Punched to long off
Shakib to Henriques, 1 run edged! Teasing ball, very slow, very wide. Turning away as he is through the drive early after stretching out. Thick edge, but over the keeper's gloves

Shoriful Islam to Henriques, no run good length on leg and angling across. Henriques skips down the wicket, to cut after getting to the leg side of the ball. Misses, and he's lucky that has not hit the stumps
Shoriful Islam to Henriques, no run good length, on middle, and some bounce this time. Tries to cut, but the ball goes over the blade to the keeper
Shoriful Islam to Henriques, FOUR runs gloved and it runs to fine leg for four. Slower ball outside leg, tries to pull. Hits the hand and goes past short fine leg
Shoriful Islam to Henriques, 2 runs good length, just outside off stump. Cut in front of square, to extra cover in the deep. Enough time for two
Shoriful Islam to Henriques, no run short ball on middle and leg. Henriques looks to pull, but it's bounced more than expected. Over the blade to the keeper. That was a promising delivery
Shoriful Islam to Henriques, FOUR runs that sounded goooood! Length ball on middle, comfortable height for Henriques. Feet firm, in position early, and swatted through the leg side for four
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run full on middle, and leg. Driven to midwicket, and the fielder in the deep runs in super fast to stop the second

Shakib to Henriques, OUT slows it down and Henriques misses the slog sweep totally. Full just outside off but angling in with the arm. Henriques goes across and gets down to hammer it through the leg side. Under the bat, past his body, and into off stump
Shakib to Wade, no run full on off and sliding across Wade as he tries to drive. Past the edge
Shakib to Wade, no run full on off, and tries to reverse sweep. Hit onto his boot
Shakib to Wade, 1 run full on middle. Tapped off the back foot to point for a single
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run full on off. Bat-pad rolls away to the leg side and they scamper across for one

Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, FOUR runs darts this one in. Full on leg, and flicked off his boots to deep backward square leg. Fielder at deep midwicket runs across a big distance, and just about cups it back into play. But the TV umpire wants to take a second look. Was his right hand hitting the skirting? Yes, unfortunately for Bangladesh
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 1 run fullish, just outside off and turning in. Punched with the bat's face at 45 degrees towards cover
Mahedi Hasan to Wade, 1 run full, just outside off. Comes down the wicket and drives to long off
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 1 run good length, just outside off. Stays on the back foot and hammers it to wide long on with a flat-batted shot
Mahedi Hasan to Wade, 1 run length ball outside off. Turning away, by bowling around the stumps. Cut to point for a quick one
Mahedi Hasan to Marsh, 1 run faster ball, length ball just outside off. Cut to deep point

Shoriful Islam to Marsh, OUT big swing to the leg side but outside edge to the keeper. Length ball on off, and tries to hit it over midwicket, but with the ball angling away he had to get closer to the line to play it in that direction. Faint edge to the keeper and that's Marsh out on 45 for the second time in two days

Shoriful Islam to Turner, 1 run full, on middle, and pushed towards point. They are off for one, and Wade running to the non-striker's is running to the danger end. Fielder picks up and takes aim at one stump for a run out but it's not a direct hit. Mahedi Hasan the man picking up the ball
Shoriful Islam to Wade, 1 run back of a length, just outside off. Pull attempted, but dragged towards the left of square leg instead
Shoriful Islam to Turner, no run fullish, on middle. Walks across to the off side slightly, and blocked back to Shoriful
Shoriful Islam to Turner, no run fullish, just outside off. Mistimed drive back to the bowler, who picks it up and fakes a throw back towards the batter
Shoriful Islam to Turner, 1 run length ball on leg and angling across. Nudged to cover for one and that over has cost just three runs
Mustafizur to Turner, no run full, outside off stump as Turner backs away to make some room expecting the ball to be in the stumps. It's not, and it's inside the tramline as well. Fair ball!
Mustafizur to Turner, 1 run cutter, full on leg. Guided to deep point for a single
Mustafizur to Wade, OUT leg stump cartwheeling! Full on off, and he walks across to the off side to try and paddle it to fine leg. Misses the shot, and the ball crashes into leg

Mustafizur to Agar, OUT Ashton leaves Ashton! Good length, outside off. Agar tentatively looks to cut it square, but there's a bit of extra bounce despite the slower ball, and it hits the glove. Pops up in the air towards the keeper and that's something his five-year old self could've also taken
Mustafizur to Starc, 1 wide slower ball, full outside leg, and rolls towards the keeper
Mustafizur to Starc, no run full ball, slower ball just outside off. Comes to drive with hard hands, and it pops up. Falls just in front of short midwicket diving forward
Mustafizur to Starc, 1 run good length, just outside off. Cut behind point and they scamper across for one
Shoriful Islam to Starc, 1 run good length, outside off and cut to deep point for one
Shoriful Islam to Turner, OUT back of a length outside off. Angling away and he tries to cut it over the off side. Spooned up in the air, and cover backtracks to take a simple one
Shoriful Islam to Starc, 2 runs
Shoriful Islam to Starc, no run full pitch, outside off stump. He walks across to the off side and mistimes a shot down the ground
Shoriful Islam to Starc, 1 run full and wide. Walks across to the off side to try and scoop it past the keeper. But too slow for him to generate any power from it. Mistimed to the off side
Shoriful Islam to Tye, 1 run good length, on middle and angling across. Pushed to point. Shoriful 2/27 tonight
Mustafizur to Tye, 2 runs full, on middle, change of pace. Bunted over the bowler to long off for a couple
Mustafizur to Tye, 1 leg bye full, pitched outside leg and hits the pad before rolling over to point. LBW appeal turned down but no way that was out
Mustafizur to Starc, FOUR runs full on middle, and flicked through the leg side. Goes finer than he attempted, but it's gone for four! First four in 25 balls
Mustafizur to Starc, no run back of a length slower ball outside off. Wants to cut, through the shot too early. Well disguised, 100% skill
Mustafizur to Starc, 2 runs slower ball, full and wide. Toe-ends the cut towards third man for one
Mustafizur to Starc, 2 runs full outside off. Clears the front leg and drags a shot to deep midwicket. Takes two and Australia finish on 121 for 7

What Australia now need are wickets at the top, and then get Shakib-Mahmudullah early as well, to have any chance of a win. Batting isn't easy over here but given Bangladesh know what rate they have to score at, they will feel comfortable earning the W.

7.32pm Bangladesh big favourites to go up 2-0 in this series. If it was spinners that caused damage yesterday, today it was the fast bowlers who used their cutters really well. Marsh impressed once again, on a surface that is tough, yes, but one that can't be used as an excuse to brush away the way the middle and lower-middle order fell apart. A marginally better but overall
Hello again. Gnasher with you for the start of the chase. Can Australia make a game of it? Mitchell Starc to open up with two slips...
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run back of a length outside off, swings away from the left hander, through to the keeper
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run at off stump, short of a length, defended towards point

Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run snorting delivery! A short ball which clatters into the helmet as Naim can't sway out of the live. Starc checks he is okay. Naim will be checked over the physio here. Seemed to take the peak of the helmet
Starc to Mohammad Naim, no run length ball, pushed firmly towards point
Starc to Mohammad Naim, 2 runs playing away from his body, gets a thickish outside edge that runs quickly to third man
Starc to Mohammad Naim, 1 run good length outside off, opens the face down to third man again...a challenging opening over from Starc
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, no run that's a slog! Good length outside off, Naim tries to swing it through midwicket but loses shape on the stroke and misses
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, 2 runs through the gap! Playing away from his body outside off, flies off the face and somehow threads through backward point
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, no run a shorter delivery, Naim pulls from outside off and finds mid-on
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, 2 runs moves across outside off then tucks this off the pads, although effectively around off stump, through square leg
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, no run round the wicket, good length outside off, Naim swings across the line and the ball scoots under the bottom edge...doesn't carry to Wade
Hazlewood to Mohammad Naim, 2 runs full outside off, steered through the gully/backward point area to third man who can't stop the second
Starc to Soumya, no run full outside off, driven to cover

Starc to Shakib, FOUR runs full and straight, a lovely piece of timing through the leg side as this is flicked wide of mid-on...a much more composed way of dealing with a very similar delivery that took the wicket
Starc to Shakib, FOUR runs and again, full at off stump, whipped off the pads through square with terrific timing. Shakib is off and running. Showing his quality as a batter

Starc to Shakib, FOUR runs edged, wide of the keeper! Terrific comeback from Starc. In the channel outside off, draws the nick as Shakib gets squared up. Wade can't reach it with a dive and there's no slip. It's all happening
Starc to Shakib, no run and he finishes with a short ball over middle and leg which Shakib can't connect with as he aims to swat it away
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, no run hammers a good length at off stump, Mahedi's hurried into his defensive shot
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, no run gets across the crease and plays forward into a fullish delivery outside off
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, 1 wide a bouncer over off stump and it's too short
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, no run pushes this fuller at the stumps, he's a little caught on the crease and plays to the on side
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, no run full and brings the drive, takes an inside edge into his boot
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, no run short of a length, goes for the pull and the ball ends up at Wade...there's appeals for a few things, but too high for lbw (it clipped the pad) and no bat involved
Agar to Shakib, no run over the wicket, almost through him first ball...beats the inside edge as Shakib aims to the leg side. Wade didn't glove it. Don't think he nicked it
Agar to Shakib, 1 run fuller, straighter, worked off the pads to short fine leg

Agar to Mahedi Hasan, 2 runs carved high in the air, but short of long-off! Mahedi trying to go over the off side, stepped away outside leg, the ball spun and he struggled to reach it. Came off the toe end
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run flicked off the pads to deep square
Agar to Shakib, 1 run full outside off, whipped firmly to long-on
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, 2 runs slog sweeps, and doesn't reach deep midwicket this time! He's living a charmed life. Tye couldn't quite make the ground
Hazlewood to Shakib, 1 run full at off stump, pushed firmly towards mid-off...there's a direct hit but he's home
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run full at middle and off, tight single into midwicket
Hazlewood to Shakib, 1 run full and straight, worked into square leg
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, 2 runs driven, and just wide of backward point! Not going to hand for Australia at the moment. Was played on the up without much control. A wry smile from Hazlewood
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, 2 runs short of a length and there's much more control in his stroke as he swivels on a pull off his hips backward of square
Hazlewood to Mahedi Hasan, 2 runs short of a length, pulled over midwicket this time, not timed but lands safely

Agar to Shakib, no run huge appeal and given! That's a massive moment. Full and straight, Shakib playing right across it. He's called the review but that looks out. Well, well...it isn't very out at all! Turning to miss leg stump. The initial line was a bit straighter than I first thought
Agar to Shakib, 1 run a powerful bottom-handed whip from outside off down the ground
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, 2 runs would you believe it! Lands short of long-off again. Gets too far underneath it as he goes down the ground
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, no run a quicker ball, 94kph, at off stump which is defended
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, no run nearly gets a leading edge back to the bowler as he aims to the leg side
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, no run backs away to the leg side and is beaten over the top edge as he aims square...I've seen more convincing innings than this, but he's still there. Somehow.
Zampa to Shakib, 1 run worked off the pads to square leg
Zampa to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run uses his feet and clubs down the ground to long-on
Zampa to Shakib, 1 run low full toss, the bottom hand comes off the bat as he drives down the ground
Zampa to Mahedi Hasan, SIX runs that's more like it! No doubts this time, that's well back over long-off...good footwork and a clean swing through the line
Zampa to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run full outside off, stretches forward and taps into the off side...sensible batting after the six
Zampa to Shakib, 1 run worked into space at midwicket
Tye to Shakib, 2 runs full and wide outside off, drives with an open face through point and nearly finds the rope...good work from Henriques at deep cover
Tye to Shakib, FOUR runs wrong line, on the pads, neatly tickled to fine leg
Tye to Mahmudullah, no run nearly played on! Short outside off, gets on his toes and plays it off the bottom edge not far from off stump
Tye to Mahmudullah, no run well bowled, full outside off, just shapes away and beats a prodding stroke
Tye to Mahmudullah, no run beaten again...full outside off, he comes forward to drive and it shapes past the bat. Nice over from Tye
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, no run straightens outside off, pushed square
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, 1 run stretches forward to a full delivery and it squirts off the inside edge backward of square
Agar to Afif, no run over the wicket, flicked from outside off to midwicket
Agar to Afif, 1 run nudged off the pads around the corner
Agar to Mahedi Hasan, no run edged, doesn't carry to slip but very well stopped by Turner
Marsh to Afif, no run full on off. Presses forward to defend towards the off side

Marsh to Afif, no run trapped lbw? Afif will be disappointed. Full, around leg stump. Looks to clip it leg side but misses. Finger raised, and Afif reviews. Afif will survive only if it pitched outside leg. And hey, it's pitched outside leg! Big reprieve for Afif.
Marsh to Afif, no run good length on his pads, and clipped to square leg
Marsh to Afif, FOUR runs brave! Walks down the ground and looks to hammer this back of a length ball through the leg side. Edged over the vacant slip region for four
Marsh to Afif, 2 runs
Marsh to Afif, no run good length, on off stump. Cut to point
Zampa to Mahedi Hasan, 1 wide full outside leg, and it slides down the leg side
Zampa to Mahedi Hasan, no run full on off, and the googly is fended off the front foot
Zampa to Nurul, no run overpitched on middle, and flicked to short midwicket. Dives to his left to stop the single
Zampa to Nurul, no run full on middle. Defended off the front foot
Zampa to Nurul, no run is he gone? Nope. Fullish, on middle, and googly turning in. Presses forward, hits the pad. Given not out
Zampa to Nurul, FOUR runs streaky! Good length, outside off stump. Cut just behind point for four
Tye to Afif, 1 run length ball angling across, and cut to the fielder at third man for a single
Tye to Nurul, 1 wide back of a length on middle, and goes over his shoulders to the keeper. Just down the leg side, reckons the umpire
Tye to Nurul, 1 run good length on middle, and going down leg. Helped along its way to fine leg for one
Tye to Afif, 1 run good length, on middle, and chops a cut to deep point
Tye to Nurul, 1 run chops another shot through to the off side for one
Tye to Afif, no run fullish, just outside off. tapped to the off side

Tye to Afif, SIX runs the extra ball goes the distance, but only just! Full on his toes, and flicked to deep midwicket. Fielder in the deep, looks like Zampa, is running to the boundary line to take a catch, and although its in his hands, he's gone over the rope. How crucial will those six runs be in a close match?
Zampa to Nurul, no run full, just outside off, and pushed towards cover. Just short of the fielder
Zampa to Nurul, 1 run overpitched on middle, and flicked to deep midwicket for a single
Zampa to Afif, no run full on middle, and the googly turns across as he looks to work it leg side. Past the edge, and through to the keeper!
Zampa to Afif, no run full on middle, and nudged to midwicket
Zampa to Afif, 2 runs full on middle, and he presses forward to defend. Outside edge to third man!
Zampa to Afif, no run fullish, outside off. Turning away, and cuts to point
Agar to Nurul, no run full from around the stumps on off stump. Firmly blocked
Agar to Nurul, 1 run good length, outside off and turning away. Drags a shot off the back foot to deep midwicket
Agar to Afif, 2 runs full on middle, and swept. Streaky, under-edged past leg stump to fine leg
Agar to Afif, 1 run full on off stump, and driven to long on for a single
Agar to Nurul, no run good length, outside off and turning away. Cut, to point
Agar to Nurul, 1 run full on middle, and turned off his pads to midwicket for one
Starc to Nurul, FOUR runs around the stumps, full on middle, and flicked beautifully! Starts the over with a bang, using the pace to nudge it to deep backward square for four!

Starc to Nurul, 1 run over the stumps. Fullish, just outside off. Tries to cut, too close to his body, and inside-edged past the stumps towards the keeper. They scamper across for one, and Wade tries to throw the stumps down at the bowler's end, but misses the direct hit. Risky play
Starc to Afif, FOUR runs in the slot, full and wide, and a controlled drive over cover! This was sublime. Right up there with Ganguly, Sangakkara and the other greats. #HoldThePose

Starc to Afif, 1 wide yorker length, on leg, and he shuffles across to clip it behind square on the leg side. Past the boot, past leg stump, and the umpire calls it a wide. Perhaps slightly harsh since it would've hit the batter's heel if he stood in his original stance
Starc to Afif, 1 run full on off, and driven to long on for a single
Starc to Nurul, 1 run fullish, on middle, and worked to midwicket for an easy single
Starc to Afif, 1 wide full, outside leg and going further down leg. Misses the flick, and wide once more
Starc to Afif, no run full on leg stump. Misses the flick, hits the pad. Not out though since it's angling down leg
Zampa to Nurul, no run full on middle. Big stride forward to defend
Zampa to Nurul, FOUR runs crunched! Short on off and turning away. Stands tall, doesn't commit early, and slaps a shot over the fielder at cover! Pierces the gap between extra cover and long off
Zampa to Nurul, no run full on off, and googly turns in. Bat-pad to the leg side
Zampa to Nurul, 1 run driven through the off side to wide long off for one
Zampa to Afif, no run full outside off, and the googly turns across. Misses the drive
Zampa to Afif, no run full on off stump. Defended to the off side. And that's Zampa done for the night
Tye to Nurul, 1 run good length, outside off. Nudged to third man for one
Tye to Afif, 1 wide back of a length, outside leg stump. Walks across to pull towards fine leg but misses. Gets the wide though
Tye to Afif, no run good length, on leg stump. Defended towards the off side
Tye to Afif, FOUR runs lofted! And we're into single digits now. Knuckle ball, on middle, and hammered over mid on for four
Tye to Afif, FOUR runs over the vacant slip cordon! Back of a length on leg and angling across. Not in control but he ramps it from close to his chest for four. Quite a thick edge
Tye to Afif, no run good length angling across. Misses the cut
Tye to Afif, no run full, on off. Slower one. Pushed to point with the angled bat
Hazlewood to Nurul, 1 run good length, just outside off. Hammers a pull to deep backward square leg
Hazlewood to Afif, no run good length ball around the stumps. Tries to cut, but whizzes past the edge to the keeper
Hazlewood to Afif, no run fullish, just outside off stump. Tapped towards backward point for one
Hazlewood to Afif, FOUR runs back of a length, outside off stump. Sticks the bat out, ramps it over the keeper and Bangladesh have won by 5 wickets!

9.30pm A fist pump between the two youngsters who have dragged Bangladesh out of a very deep hole. Even Justin Langer is applauding them. A lone fan is flying the flag on a nearly building's roof. Imagine if we had a full crowd today! The partnership is unbeaten on 56.... to win from 67/5 with Australia's bowlers roaring, it needed a special effort.

The high-adrenaline chase wil make Afif and Nurul heroes this evening, but don't forget the bowling effort. To restrict Australia to 121 is massive, and credit for that goes to Mustafizur and Shoriful firstly, along with the ever consistent spinners.
Presentation coming up.
That's all from myself Sreshth, Andrew McGlashan and Ranjith P. Remember there's plenty of cricket happening. England v India and the Hundred. Hop over there to enjoy more cricket. See you!
Bangladesh won by 5 wickets (with 8 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Afif Hossain, BDESH
